$block: Details about an individual conversation. Conversation tracking is a feature available to paid accounts that lets you view replies to your campaigns in your Mailchimp account.

**id**: A string that uniquely identifies this conversation.

**timestamp**: The date and time the message was either sent or received in ISO 8601 format.

**message_count**: The total number of messages in this conversation.
**subject**: The subject of the message.
